query.name: findByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION WHERE STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID = ?

query.name: findByName
query.sql: SELECT * FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION WHERE NAME = ?

query.name: findByPKAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT SED.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION SED, study st WHERE SED.study_event_definition_id = ? AND SED.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findByOidAndStudy
query.sql: SELECT SED.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION SED, study st WHERE SED.oc_oid = ? AND SED.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findByOid
query.sql: SELECT SED.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION SED WHERE SED.oc_oid = ?

query.name: findAll
query.sql: SELECT * FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION

query.name: findAllByStudy
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed, study st WHERE sed.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) order by sed.ordinal asc

query.name: findAllAvailableByStudy
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed, study st WHERE sed.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) AND sed.status_id NOT IN (5) order by sed.ordinal asc

query.name: findAllAvailableWithEvaluableCRFByStudy
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed, study st WHERE (sed.study_id = st.study_id) AND (st.study_id = ?) AND sed.status_id NOT IN (5) AND sed.study_event_definition_id IN (SELECT study_event_definition_id FROM event_definition_crf WHERE evaluated_crf = 1 AND status_id NOT IN (5, 7) AND (study_id = st.study_id OR study_id IN (SELECT study_id FROM study WHERE parent_study_id = ?))) ORDER BY sed.ordinal asc

query.name: findAllAvailableWithEvaluableCRFBySite
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed, study st WHERE (sed.study_id = st.parent_study_id) AND st.study_id = ? AND sed.status_id NOT IN (5) AND sed.study_event_definition_id IN (SELECT study_event_definition_id FROM event_definition_crf WHERE evaluated_crf = 1 AND status_id NOT IN (5, 7) AND (study_id = st.study_id OR study_id = st.parent_study_id) AND crf_id NOT IN (SELECT crf_id FROM event_definition_crf WHERE evaluated_crf = 0 AND study_id = ?)) ORDER BY sed.ordinal asc

query.name: findAllActiveByStudy
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed, study st WHERE sed.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) AND sed.status_id=1 order by sed.ordinal asc

query.name: findAllByStudyAndLimit
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed, study st WHERE sed.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?) and rownum <= 5 order by sed.date_updated desc

query.name: findNextKey
query.sql: select study_event_definition_id_seq.nextval as key from dual

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION (study_event_definition_id,STUDY_ID, NAME,DESCRIPTION, REPEATING, "TYPE", CATEGORY, OWNER_ID,STATUS_ID,DATE_CREATED, ordinal,oc_oid, day_min,day_max,day_email,schedule_day,reference_visit,email_user_id) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION SET STUDY_ID=?,NAME=?, DESCRIPTION=?,REPEATING=?,TYPE=?,CATEGORY=?,STATUS_ID=?, DATE_UPDATED=sysdate,UPDATE_ID=?, ordinal=?, day_min=?,day_max=?,day_email=?,schedule_day=?,reference_visit=?,email_user_id=? WHERE STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID=?

query.name: updateStatus
query.sql: UPDATE STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION SET STATUS_ID=?, DATE_UPDATED=NOW(), UPDATE_ID=? WHERE STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID=?

query.name: findAllWithStudyEvent
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT D.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION D , STUDY_EVENT E , study st WHERE D.study_event_definition_id = E.study_event_definition_id AND D.study_id=st.study_id AND (st.study_id=? or st.parent_study_id=?)

query.name: findAllByCrf
query.sql: select distinct sed.* from study_event_definition sed, event_definition_crf edc where sed.study_event_definition_id = edc.study_event_definition_id and edc.crf_id = ?

query.name: findByEventDefinitionCRFId
query.sql: SELECT D.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION D, EVENT_DEFINITION_CRF E WHERE D.study_event_definition_id = E.study_event_definition_id AND E.event_definition_crf_id = ?

query.name: findAllActiveByParentStudyId
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed, study st WHERE sed.study_id = st.study_id AND (st.study_id=?) AND sed.status_id=1 order by sed.ordinal asc

query.name: findAllActiveByParentStudyIdOrderedByGroupClass
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed INNER JOIN study st ON sed.study_id = st.study_id LEFT OUTER JOIN dynamic_event de ON sed.study_event_definition_id = de.study_event_definition_id LEFT OUTER JOIN study_group_class sgc ON de.study_group_class_id = sgc.study_group_class_id WHERE (st.study_id=?) AND sed.status_id=1 order by sgc.dynamic_ordinal, sed.ordinal asc

query.name: findAllOrderedByStudyGroupClassId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM study_event_definition INNER JOIN dynamic_event ON dynamic_event.study_event_definition_id = study_event_definition.study_event_definition_id WHERE dynamic_event.study_group_class_id = ? ORDER BY dynamic_event.ordinal

query.name: findAllAvailableAndOrderedByStudyGroupClassId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM study_event_definition INNER JOIN dynamic_event ON dynamic_event.study_event_definition_id = study_event_definition.study_event_definition_id WHERE dynamic_event.study_group_class_id = ? AND study_event_definition.status_id NOT IN (5) ORDER BY dynamic_event.ordinal

query.name: findAllActiveNotClassGroupedByStudyId
query.sql: SELECT defs.* FROM study_event_definition defs WHERE defs.status_id = 1 AND defs.study_id = ? AND defs.study_event_definition_id NOT IN (SELECT study_event_definition_id FROM dynamic_event INNER JOIN study_group_class ON study_group_class.study_group_class_id = dynamic_event.study_group_class_id WHERE study_group_class.status_id = 1 AND study_group_class.study_id = defs.study_id)

query.name: findReferenceVisitBeans
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION sed WHERE sed.reference_visit = 'true'

query.name: getEventNamesFromStudy
query.sql: SELECT distinct name, repeating FROM study_event_definition WHERE study_id=?

query.name: findAllActiveByStudyIdAndCRFId
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM study_event_definition sed, event_definition_crf edc WHERE sed.status_id = 1 AND sed.study_id = ? AND edc.study_event_definition_id = sed.study_event_definition_id AND edc.crf_id = ?

query.name: findAllActiveCalendaredEventsByStudyId
query.sql: SELECT sed.* FROM study_event_definition sed WHERE sed.status_id = 1 AND sed.study_id = ? AND sed.type = 'calendared_visit'

query.name: deleteEventDefinition
query.sql: DELETE FROM study_event_definition WHERE study_event_definition_id = ?
